trans-unit.source: A secure and interoperable binding that supports federated security.
trans-unit.target: En säker och samverkande bindning som stöder federerade säkerhet.

trans-unit.source: Federation is the ability to share identities across multiple systems for authentication and authorization.
trans-unit.target: Federation är möjlighet att dela identiteter över flera system för autentisering och auktorisering.

trans-unit.source: These identities can refer to users or to machines.
trans-unit.target: Dessa identiteter kan hänvisa till användare eller datorer.

trans-unit.source: Federated HTTP supports SOAP security as well as mixed-mode security, but it does not support exclusively using transport security.
trans-unit.target: Federerad HTTP stöder SOAP-säkerhet samt blandat läge säkerhet, men stöder inte exklusivt av transportsäkerhet.

trans-unit.source: This binding provides [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] support for the WS-Federation protocol.
trans-unit.target: Den här bindningen innehåller [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] stöd för protokollet WS-Federation.

trans-unit.source: Services configured with this binding must use the HTTP transport.
trans-unit.target: Tjänster som har konfigurerats med den här bindningen måste använda HTTP-transport.

trans-unit.source: Bindings consist of a stack of binding elements.
trans-unit.target: Bindningar som består av en samling bindningselement.

trans-unit.source: The stack of binding elements in WSFederationHttpBinding is the same as that contained in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> when <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> is set to the default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.
trans-unit.target: Stacken av bindningselement i WSFederationHttpBinding är samma som i <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>när <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A>har angetts till standardvärdet <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: The WSFederationHttpBinding controls the details of the message security settings, the values of which are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: WSFederationHttpBinding styr information om säkerhetsinställningar för meddelandet, som är tillgängliga från instansen av <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>som returneras av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>

trans-unit.source: The WSFederationHttpBinding also provides a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.PrivacyNoticeAt%2A> property to set and retrieve the URI at which the privacy notice is located.
trans-unit.target: WSFederationHttpBinding innehåller också en <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.PrivacyNoticeAt%2A>egenskapen för att ange och hämta URI där sekretessmeddelandet finns.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.PrivacyNoticeAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When calling a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service built with [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/add/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] from a WCF client application built with [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] or earlier, the configuration file generated by svcutil.exe or adding a service reference from [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] contains the `establishSecurityContext` attribute in the binding configuration.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Vid anrop av en [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tjänsten som skapats med [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/add/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] från en WCF-klientprogram som skapats med [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] eller tidigare, konfigurationsfilen genereras genom svcutil.exe eller lägga till en tjänstereferens från [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] innehåller den `establishSecurityContext` attribut i bindningskonfigurationen.

trans-unit.source: This attribute is not recognized by the [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] runtime and the application throws an <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> with the message "Unrecognized attribute establishSecurityContext ".
trans-unit.target: Det här attributet inte kan identifieras av den [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/add/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] körning och den utlöser en <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException>med meddelandet "Okänt attribut establishSecurityContext".</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException>

trans-unit.source: To workaround this problem, remove the `establishSecurityContext` attribute from the binding configuration.
trans-unit.target: För att lösa problemet, ta bort den `establishSecurityContext` attribut från bindningskonfigurationen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The details of these settings are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Information om dessa inställningar är tillgängliga från instansen av <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>som returneras av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"> </xref> klass med en viss typ av säkerhet som används av bindningen.

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> which specifies that integrity, confidentiality, and server and client authentication are provided using SOAP message security.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet för <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>är <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>som anger att autentiseringen integritet, sekretess, och servrar och klientdatorer finns i SOAP-meddelandesäkerhet.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The details of these settings are available from the instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp> that is returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Information om dessa inställningar är tillgängliga från instansen av <xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>som returneras av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: Värdet för <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> som anger vilken typ av säkerhet som används med SOAP-meddelandet och för klienten.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a binding specified by its configuration name.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"> </xref> klass med en bindning som angetts med ett konfigurationsnamn.

trans-unit.source: The binding configuration name for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurationsnamnet bindningen för den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The binding element with the name configurationName was not found.
trans-unit.target: Binding-element med namnet configurationName hittades inte.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding and a value that indicates whether a reliable session is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"> </xref> klass med en viss typ av säkerhet som används av bindning och ett värde som anger om en tillförlitlig session har aktiverats.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: Värdet för <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> som anger vilken typ av säkerhet som används med SOAP-meddelandet och för klienten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a reliable session is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om en tillförlitlig session aktiveras; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a collection with the binding elements for the binding.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en samling med bindningselementen för bindningen.

trans-unit.source: The stack of binding elements depends on the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> set.
trans-unit.target: Stacken för bindningselement är beroende av värdet för den <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>Ange.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The stack of binding elements in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding> is the same as that contained in <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> when <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> is set to the default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.
trans-unit.target: Stacken för bindningselement i <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding>är samma som i <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>när <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A>har angetts till standardvärdet <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>2.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>3.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SymmetricSecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>4.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement> However, setting <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> results in a stack that is something of a hybrid between the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding> bindings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>Dock ange <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>till <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>resulterar i en grupp som är något en hybrid den <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>och <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>Bindningar.</xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>2.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement>3.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>4.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TextMessageEncodingBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement> Finally, using the MTOM encoder looks exactly the same as for <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement>Slutligen verkar med hjälp av MTOM-kodare exakt desamma <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>2.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement>3.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> that makes up the binding.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> av typen <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>som utgör bindningen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> that has enabled a reliable session.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>som har aktiverat en tillförlitlig session.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> that has enabled a reliable session.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>som har aktiverat en tillförlitlig session.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Returns the transport binding element from the current binding.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar transportbindningselementet från den aktuella bindningen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> from the current binding.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>från den aktuella bindningen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URI at which the privacy notice is located.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den URI där sekretessmeddelandet finns.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> at which the privacy notice is located.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Uri>på där sekretessmeddelandet finns.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the privacy notice version number for the binding.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger versionsnumret för sekretess meddelande för bindningen.

trans-unit.source: The version number of the privacy notice.
trans-unit.target: Versionsnummer för sekretessmeddelandet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of security used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger typ av säkerhet som används med den här bindningen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity"></xref> that specifies the mode of security used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity"> </xref> som anger läget för säkerhet som används med den här bindningen.

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref> for this binding is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet för den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> för den här bindningen är <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett värde som anger om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*>egenskap har ändrats från sitt standardvärde och ska serialiseras.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*>egenskapsvärdet måste vara serialiserade, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding.Security*>
